channel.title: Cache downloader
channel.description:
base is DSPK, i tried to change the cache downloader and i made the cache .zip and i put it in public in dropbox, then i copied link and added that to gui.java and cachedownloader.java. but when i compile then run i get this in run cmd.
[code]java.net.UnknownHostException: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32415818/Detri-Scape.zip at java.net.Inet4AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method) at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(InetAddress.java:850) at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(InetAddress.java:1201)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(InetAddress.java:1154) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1084) at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1020) at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(InetAddress.java:970) at Gui.<init>(Gui.java:32) at Gui.main(Gui.java:26) Press any key to continue . . . [/code]

item.title: Cache downloader
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

base is DSPK, i tried to change the cache downloader and i made the cache .zip and i put it in public in dropbox, then i copied link and added that to gui.java and cachedownloader.java. but when i compile then run i get this in run cmd.

[code]java.net.UnknownHostException: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/32415818/Detri-Scape.zip
at java.net.Inet4AddressImpl.lookupAllHostAddr(Native Method)
at java.net.InetAddress$1.lookupAllHostAddr(InetAddress.java:850)
at java.net.InetAddress.getAddressFromNameService(InetAddress.java:1201)

    at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName0(InetAddress.java:1154)
    at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1084)
    at java.net.InetAddress.getAllByName(InetAddress.java:1020)
    at java.net.InetAddress.getByName(InetAddress.java:970)
    at Gui.<init>(Gui.java:32)
    at Gui.main(Gui.java:26)

Press any key to continue . . .
[/code]
